nodes.text: The Vine Matron was the female patron saint of the area on the planet Hetzal Prime where Keven Tarr was raised. Tarr sent up a quick prayer to her just before he activated an array of thousands of navidroids he had set up on the Rooted Moon to calculate the next potential Emergence of the Great Hyperspace Disaster. Senator Izzet Noor was also praying at the event, but not to the Vine Matron.
The Vine Matron was first mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi, by Charles Soule.
